title: Apartment for Rent 2 Bed / 1 Bath, private back yard, central AC/heat
description:
Full unit for rent starting July 1, 2022 for a one-year lease.
2 bedroom, 1 bathroom in West Philly, near 51st and Chester.
Includes central air/heat, dishwasher, and washer/dryer. Hardwood floors throughout, lots of windows, and all new kitchen appliances. Lots of closet space (see pictures!) with built in organizer shelves and rods. Private back yard, beautiful front porch. Pets OK with refundable deposit. Easy street parking.
Located half a block from the 13 Trolley, across the street from the Kingsessing Library (and Kingsessing Recreation Center), 2 blocks from the 49th St. Station (runs directly to 30th St Station & the Airport). Only a 10-15 minute walk to Baltimore Ave, where you'll find plenty of shops, restaurants, and culture. About a 10-15 minute walk to Clark Park, where there is a Farmer's Market on Saturday mornings, year round.
First, last, security needed ($3600) to move in.

Each individual adult must have an income of $3600+/month and is required to complete application and be named on the lease. This requirement may be waived for married couples, as long as joint income is $3600+/month.
Note: confirmation of having amount required for move-in AND income must be demonstrated through application/credit check; paystubs/screenshots are not accepted.
Send private message to schedule an appointment to see!

description:

The Rittenhouse Market, Target, and Trader Joe's are nearby. Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, and Madewell. Local restaurants include Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Marathon Grill. Sip a coffee at La Colombe. Buy bread at Metropolitan Bakery. title: 3 bedroom, 2 ½ bath apt w/ garage
description:
3 bedroom, 2 ½ bathroom condo for rent in beautiful townhouse in Logan Square / Rittenhouse Square area.
Upon entering the unit, you enter a spacious and sun filled living and dining area, perfect for T.V., entertainment, studying and/or relaxing spot for the residents.  On this level, the condo unit features a new, modern kitchen with granite counters, and stainless appliances.  Adjacent to the kitchen is balcony and a dining area.  Kitchen has beautiful Thomasville natural wood cabinets.  There is more than enough cabinet and counter space.
Head upstairs where you will find 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms.  Master suite features a wardrobe area (with closets) and a master bathroom.  Washer and dryer on the upper level.  Bedroom two features a walk-in closet.  Bedrooms three and two are on the southern side of the upper floor.
Main level has a powder room, with built-in shelving in the living/dining area.  There is ample storage space in the basement.
This property is in a fantastic section of center city Philadelphia, convenient to I-76, 676, the U Penn and Drexel campuses in West Philly, and all of center city.  Walkable to Giant, Trader Joes, Rittenhouse Square.   Also an easy walk to 30th Street Station and buses and the Market St subway line.  This location has it all, and this unit comes with its own one-car garage.
Great location for grad students, a young family or young professionals.  Pets are on a case by case basis.
Rent: $3,850 / month.  1 Year lease.  July 1 or July 15 start date.  Utilities not included in rent.

title: Spacious Studio Apartment Home for Short Term Lease, Wood Floors, Gym
description:
The studio apartment home at 2503 is available for lease at this moment! This home on the 25th floor features large windows that face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a city view! The renovated kitchen features a dishwasher, disposal, gas stove, and microwave. This home features wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
Due to planned renovations, please note that the stay in this particular home is from 2, 3, and 4 months only, until October 31, 2022.
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping and dining! The Rittenhouse Market, Target, and Trader Joe's are nearby. Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, and Madewell. Local restaurants include Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Marathon Grill. Sip a coffee at La Colombe. Buy bread at Metropolitan Bakery. Savor a selection of macarons from Miel Patisserie.
Community Amenities:
* Top-of-the-line fitness center
* Yoga/Fitness studio
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Elevator building with 24/7  front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry room on 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Studio apartment home on 25th floor
* 475 square feet
* City view
* East-facing windows
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floors
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available for lease? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to see if 2503 is still listed under the Monet floor plan. Please make an appointment to tour with ResMate, our chatbot concierge on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com. You may have a guided tour in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 4 month lease term.
2, 3, and 4 month lease terms on this particular home available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
Welcome home!

Parking + Best location in Philly! $2849 - 3 Bed / 1 Bath House in the heart of Fishtown / No Libs with PARKING! Available 7/15 or later Modern Kitchen with Backyard Haven: Charming, private 3 bedroom 1 bathroom house in Philadelphia's trendiest neighborhood. Close to the Market Frankford line (the El Girard HUB) - 4 min walk, all the Piazza and Northern Liberties has to offer - 6 min walk, Frankford Hall and Philadelphia's hottest restaurants on Frankford Ave - 4 min walk, The Fillmore concert venue, Goose Island Brewing, Punchline Philly - 5 min walk, & if you have the gambling itch, Sugar House, only an 8 min walk. See map in the photos. There is hardwood flooring throughout this updated, 3 story street-to-street property. You will have plenty of room with 3 bedrooms (w/ closet space), a living room, large dining room (see picture with long table), & the brand new modern kitchen with new cabinets and granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances & new double pane energy efficient wondows throughout. There is parking off of Lee street through a brand new private electric gate, also plenty of room to host a backyard BBQ on beautiful summer nights before heading to the Piazza or the Fillmore for a concert or heading out to Garage, Barcade, Johnny Brendas or any of the local establishments in Fishtown & Northern Liberties. Neighborhood Description http://national.citysearch.com/guide/northern-liberties-and-fishtown-philadelphia-pa http://dguides.com/philadelphia/nightlife/northern-liberties-fishtown/ WHAT I LOVE ABOUT THE HOME Conveniently situated between the thriving Northern Liberties and Fishtown neighborhoods. No matter which direction you choose, either towards 3rd Street or Frankford Avenue, you are a stones throw away from a plethora of restaurants/bars, shops and markets, the river front, Penns Landing, Festival Pier, Race St. Pier, the new Fillmore complex, Sugar House Casino and the Piazza at Schmidts. One Block from the Girard SEPTA subway station into Center City, SEPTA bus stops and the newly renovated Girard Trolley Line. Quick and easy access to I-95/676/76.

title: Looking for a third roommate !
description:
Hi everyone! Two roommates are looking for someone to fill a bedroom in our East Kensington apartment. We’ve lived here just about a year, and it’s been great. There’s plenty of space, a giant roof deck, and it’s only a block away from the York/Dauphin stop on the El, so getting around the city is super easy. Parking is never a problem either. The open bedroom is on the first floor and has a cute balcony. Your bathroom is right outside the bedroom. Rent is $1000 a month + utilities so altogether it’s ~$1000. Move in would be July 1, but we can try and work with you if you’re looking to make an earlier move.
About us: We are two young professionals in our twenties! Mollie is a teacher and MaryBeth works at a local radio station. Mollie loves to bake so we always have plenty of cookies to try ;) We also have a cat named Uno, so no new pets!

title: Elevator Building , Hardwood Floors , Close To Train
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: 1-bedroom unit in the highly desirable Industry Condo!
description: 1-bedroom unit in the highly desirable Industry Condo! This 1 bed, 1 bath condo features a unique modern-industrial design and that is part of a boutique 22-unit community right in the heart of Conshohocken! This unit features a gorgeous living room/dining room area and modern kitchen with breakfast bar, beautiful maple flooring, bathroom with brushed nickel vessel sink and faucet, tiled backsplash and beautiful jacuzzi tub, central air, and an in-unit washer/dryer combo. Fantastic location nestled between Center City and King of Prussia, with easy access to I-76 and the Blue Route (I-476). Right around the corner you will find all that Conshohocken has to offer, with biking/walking trails and many restaurants, shops and other amenities within walking distance. Plus, regional rail lines just a few blocks away. .. a public transit commuters dream! This is an extremely rare opportunity to live in a one bedroom unit in the beautiful Industry Condominiums. ..

title: Charming One Bedroom  In Haverford
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

-New fitness center
-Spacious floor plans with large bedrooms and closets
-Modernista Apartment kitchens with stainless steel appliances available
-Professional on-site management team
-Beautiful courtyards
-Garage and parking lot available
-Elevator building
-Smoke-free apartments available
-Complimentary Wi-Fi lounge
-Seasonal Bike Share Program

title: A beautiful 1-bedroom with a DEN Dresher condo at the Grande!
description: A beautiful 1-bedroom with a DEN Dresher condo at the Grande!  living literally steps away from all of Fayette Streets shops and restaurants, this is a must see. Step inside to the impeccably maintained condo complete with the highly sought-after open floorplan. Neutral paint and flooring throughout is sure to please any decorating taste (or is the perfect blank canvas for those who want to add a vibrant splash of color!) Hardwood flooring is located in the entry way (where you will find the private laundry closet) and throughout the kitchen. The kitchen features 42” cabinetry, granite countertops, a breakfast bar, and stainless steel appliance package (refrigerator, gas range, built-in microwave and dishwasher). The breakfast bar is ideal to grab a quick weeknight meal or use as the snack-hub when hosting. The spacious living room comes complete with plush carpeting, recessed lighting and glass sliders that allow loads of natural light to stream inside. The patio is large enough to add a comfy chair or two to enjoy the outdoors this spring and summer, and also features two separate closets. Throw down an outdoor rug, add some potted plants and get ready to enjoy your own outdoor oasis. The bedroom receives excellent natural lighting and is accented with crown molding. The large walk-in closet provides all the space you need for clothes and accessories. The bathroom features tile floors, over-sized one sink vanity, a tub shower with glass sliders and additional shelving space for towels. The best part about this 1-bedroom floorplan? The added den space! Great for those who work from home and need a home office, set up as a cozy reading area, add a peloton and some weights for your own work-out studio or use as a guest bedroom when friends and family need to stay over. Parking is a breeze! This condo includes a 1 car garage parking space and there is a huge parking lot for overflow parking. The community pool is located in the courtyard of this building, which will come in handy during the summer months. There are BBQ areas scattered throughout the community and the fitness center is located in building 350 right next door. Easy access to the Schuylkill River Bike Trail and the Septa Train Station.

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home with Wood Floors on Rittenhouse Square
description:
The studio apartment home at 2210 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 22nd floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 2, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Studio apartment home on 22nd floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large south-facing windows
* Chancellor Street view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 2210 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. We welcome you to tour your new home in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 20 month lease term.
2-22 month lease terms available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.

title: Welcome to The Grande in Conshohocken.
description: Welcome to The Grande in Conshohocken. This beautiful, spacious 1 bedroom, 1 bath condo is ready for you! The entrance foyer has hardwood floors, a large closet/pantry and an oversized double closet with a new washer & dryer. The kitchen, which opens to the living area, has a breakfast bar with Corian countertops, 42" cabinets, gas stove, microwave, and refrigerator. The bedroom overlooks the courtyard and includes a large walk-in closet. The bathroom has a large vanity and a tub with a shower. There are new carpets in the bedroom, a new washer and dryer, new water heater, refrigerator and water expansion tank . This updated home is in impeccable condition and comes with one deeded garage space! Move right in and start enjoying this secure building with key fob access, surveillance system and trash/recycling chutes on every floor. Fee includes a gorgeous pool, new fitness center and new outdoor barbeque grills, fireplace and gathering spaces. Located in the heart of Conshohocken, you can walk to many excellent restaurants, shopping, offices and train. Entrance to the Schuylkill River Bike Trail is right behind the building. You can ride to Philadelphia or Valley Forge along the river. Enjoy easy access to major transportation routes, King of Prussia and Center City Philadelphia.
